title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream #31
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: My favorite Horror movie of all time is Halloween (1978) and honorable mentions are Texas Chainsaw Massacre (1974) & A Nightmare On Elm Street (1984) Wait I guess I'd also pick When A Stranger Calls the one from the 1970's not the crappy remake they did in 2006 Lol.
Personally, my favourite horror movie is All Hallows' Eve. It's just... terrifying....
Can you start talking about Cult? About the new teasers? About AHSCULT.com ? About the thing they are having in Pennsylvania?
Are you going to watch the Suspiria remake? I believe Chloe Grace Moretz is the lead female role. Aye Jennifer Lawrence is from my hometown. Love her as well. Great actress.

Maybe this season goes back to freak show maybe continuing what happens after bett and dott got pregnant maybe their son or daughter was obsessed with twisty the comic something happens to the freaks after the presidency which causes a group of freaks to stand up for what they believe in
description:
Welcome to American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Streams! Host is MaryGirl Moody.
